biotools.summary: Ligand Binding site Recognition Application predicts the presence and identity of active sites and/or ligand binding sites. The software is based on a graph theory approach to find the largest subset of similar residues between an input protein and a collection of known functional sites.

bioschemas.name: LIBRA
